name: Profire Energy, Inc.
description: Profire Energy, Inc. is a leading provider of combustion management technologies and services, primarily for the oil and gas industry. Founded in 2000 and headquartered in Lindon, Utah, Profire designs, manufactures, and sells a range of products aimed at improving the efficiency and safety of burner operations. Their product offerings include advanced burner management systems, ignition systems, and related technologies that help clients enhance operational performance and reduce emissions. Profire's solutions are critical in environments where combustion is utilized, ensuring compliance with safety regulations while optimizing fuel usage. The company is dedicated to innovation and customer service, fostering strong relationships with clients to meet their unique needs. Profire aims to provide state-of-the-art technology that not only meets industry standards but also leads the market in performance and reliability. The company is committed to sustainability and environmental responsibility, aligning its business practices with the need for cleaner energy solutions. With a seasoned management team and a focus on research and development, Profire continues to expand its market presence and improve its product offerings, positioning itself as a key player in the energy sector.
